content: SeedlyTV EP07 P2P Lending Investments Asked by Gabriel ThamAsked on 25 Jun 2019Will there be a case like hyflux or dbs minibonds in P2P lending?Will there be a case like hyflux or dbs minibonds in P2P lending?1 answerAnswerBump2

Terence Tan, CMT, Head of Education at IG AsiaLevel 2. RookieAnswered on 18 Jul 2019There will always be risks involved, and higher so for P2P lending. Always go in with your eyes open, diversify instead of putting your eggs into just a few baskets, and expect some negative surprises in a small percentage of the P2P deals.0 comments0
